mapper.select: SELECT store_id storeId, customer_id customerId, sum(payed_amount) carAmount, count(1) carNum FROM `crd_card_order` WHERE store_id = #{storeId} AND STATUS = 'SETTLE_CARD' AND payment_time >= #{beginTime} and is_delete=0 group by customer_id
